tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE payment_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    expiration_date DATE,
    cvv VARCHAR(3),
    encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    cvv VARCHAR(3),
    expiration_date DATE,
    encrypted_card_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_id INT REFERENCES payments(id),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encrypted_card_number TEXT NOT NULL,
    encrypted_card_holder_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    encrypted_expiry_date TEXT NOT NULL,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    encrypted_card_number VARCHAR(255),
    encrypted_expiry_date VARCHAR(20),
    encrypted_cvv VARCHAR(10),
    amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
    payment_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (payment_id) REFERENCES payments(payment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cards (
    card_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    encrypted_card_number VARCHAR(255),
    encrypted_expiry_date VARCHAR(20),
    encrypted_cvv VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE payment_cards (
  card_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
  card_holder VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  expiry_date DATE NOT NULL,
  cvv INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY,
  card_id INT REFERENCES payment_cards(card_id),
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  password_hash VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE addresses (
  address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  street_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  postal_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
  key_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  encryption_key VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
